channel.title: ::Character help
channel.description:
Hello I have played servers before where when you do ::char after you pick your look you automatically look like what you chose, but in mine you still look the same till you click the screen. How can I fix this?
Thanks

item.title: ::Character help
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

ive seen ones that work instant mine wont change till you click

Read full topic

item.title: ::Character help
item.dc:creator: @Undernoob Undernoob
item.description:
@Undernoob wrote:

Well sum times is takes a little to update cause Rsps arnt perfect ya know…It could take any where from 5-15 secs and if this didn’t work try logging out and back in and see if that works

Read full topic
